summary: The kilometre is a common unit used for longer distances on Earth.
full_text:
The kilometre  or kilometer  is a unit of length in the metric system, equal to one thousand metres . It is now the measurement unit used officially for expressing distances between geographical places on land in most of the world; notable exceptions are the United States and the United Kingdom where the statute mile is the official unit used.
k  is occasionally used in some English-speaking countries as an alternative for the word kilometre in colloquial writing and speech. A slang term for the kilometre in the US military is klick.
title: Kilometer
